title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 122.3 - Police agency procedures and reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 122.3 - Police agency procedures and reports

State Regulations
(a) Ticket supply. (1)

The police agencies in the jurisdictions
in which a bureau exists shall secure and maintain a sufficient supply of
tickets for distribution to all police officers empowered to issue tickets for
violations occurring within each such jurisdiction. (2)

Each police agency shall maintain by
serial number a record of tickets received. (b) Distribution of tickets by police
agencies. (1)

Each agency receiving tickets
and the Division of State Police shall be responsible for the assignment of
tickets to police officers under its command. (2)

Tickets shall be assigned to police
officers in consecutive series order. (c) Recordkeeping. Each police agency shall
maintain a control record of all tickets assigned to police officers under its
jurisdiction and a record of the disposition of all summonses and complaints, appearance tickets and notices of violation issued. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
122.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
